Class User

java.lang.Object
model.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Applicant, Manager
public class User extends Object
Base class representing a system user with common attributes and filter settings.

Stores personal details and provides utility to update project browsing filters.

Since:
24/4/2025
Version:
final
Author:
FCSH Group 2

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int
    age
    The user’s age in years.
    private String
    maritalStatus
    The user’s marital status ("Single" or "Married").
    private String
    name
    The user’s name.
    private String
    neighbourhoodFilter
    Neighborhood filter for browsing projects.
    private String
    nric
    The user’s NRIC (unique identifier).
    private String
    password
    The user’s login password.
    private String
    typeFilter
    Flat-type filter for browsing projects.
    private int
    wantSort
    Sorting choice: 1 = sort by project name, 0 = no sorting.

      name - the user’s name
      nric - the user’s NRIC (unique)
      age - the user’s age
      maritalStatus - the user’s marital status
      password - the user’s password

      public void setPassword()
      Prompts the console user to enter and set a new password.

    • updateFilter

      public void updateFilter()
      Prompts for and updates the neighborhood filter, flat‐type filter, and sorting preference.

      Continues to prompt until a valid sort choice (0 or 1) is entered.
